title: 電木結他樂理你問我拍(46)

replies.msg:
我係一名全職電木結他,bass, 鼓, ukulele, 老師 想為大家解答下音樂 or 樂器問題
Youtube:
[urlhttps://]www.youtube.com/swy999[/url]

fb page
https://www.facebook.com/pages/a a’aa¿ƒplays-music/430639887082691?ref=h

ig:
https://instagram.com/jimmyshum

學結他:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1w3tAezaHFkqw3tv7neMWZxqWdf1HTZHAInBOJKDNgIw

我地既wtsapp group<毒拎之家>:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1yeQv5ilo5C2DU1XL9RRGOioTlnC1iccTXTKU_KTXU7k

毒拎之家每星期功課連講解:
#1(fast run, sweep, change)
https://youtu.be/QBZ9p6AcmAw
#2 string skipping/arp
https://youtu.be/tmLAbire39Y

我的簡介:
Trinity Rock School Grade 8 - Guitar (Merit)
Trinity Rock School Grade 8 Performace Certificate - Guitar (Merit)
Rock School Grade 8 - Drum Kit(Merit)
Rock School Grade 8 - Bass Guitar(Merit)

約10年教學經驗 曾於通櫃琴行及柏C琴行, 仲有大大小小不同琴行及中小學任教 電結他, 木結他, BASS, 流行鼓及ukulele。

連續兩屆 <<Schecter結他大師挑戰賽>> 香港區最高人氣獎(中國區第五及第十名)

Play It Loud 青年原創音樂比賽：最佳結他手

Play It Loud 青年原創音樂比賽：亞軍

Love Music 青年音樂匯演: 季軍(As drummer)

Guitar legend 全港八強Finalist

香港公開大學音樂學會技術顧問(2015~2017)

我亦係熟手homestudio技工, 毒自在家中錄音問題全部可以問我, 我會盡量盡量解釋

你問我拍教學系列:

建立HomeStudio教學 走數1年的感言+送你小禮物
https://youtu.be/jxEQWnavIHc (Hi, 好多人話把聲好Seven, 下次一定會型番)

咁睇黎本身你都識少少基本野..

可以試下搵下呢本書, 台灣盧家宏的, 佢彈fingerstyle 都算有名, 入面會有啲由淺入深ge 教學,有一part 會講下點樣將arrange 流行音樂, 亦都有啲練習..

btw, 如果要彈fingerstyle 要對chord 組成ge 理解 (eg, C major, C minor, C7 chord 啲音主要有咩分別, 邊一兩粒音主要啲...),
chord 係fretboard 上不同位置的形狀 (eg. C chord 有好多個禁法...),
同埋對fretboard 同音階ge熟練程度 (eg. 要比較快講得到第幾線第幾格係咩音, 係邊個scale 第幾個音咁...) 等等呢啲都要加深, 如果唔係到時睇譜想知佢做咩同埋arrange 譜果時都會睇/ 諗死你....

睇 0左 spec
3210 係 rosewood fingerboard
如果根據呢篇0野0既講法 (佢0既預測):
https://www.pmtonline.co.uk/blog/2017/05/19/a-guide-to-the-cites-law-on-rosewood-guitars/
由今年開始, 已經 "有潛質" 成為珍貴 item 啦

節錄:

In summary, this is basically how the CITES law will affect guitarists:

- Importing/exporting rosewood will become very expensive for brands

- Guitar brands will eventually start switching to more sustainable woods that don’t require certification

- Getting hold of a rosewood guitar will soon become difficult

- You can travel with your guitar without certification unless you’re travelling with over 10kg of Rosewood

- Certain guitars will start shipping with CITES “Passports”

- Travelling musicians won’t need to worry as you only need CITES documents for post-convention instruments imported into the E.U. after 2nd Jan 2017. However, you may be asked to prove that your guitar is older than this.

- Your Rosewood guitar will potentially become a collector’s item

- If you're going to buy a guitar with rosewood, NOW is the time to do it!
